com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.actions

Class MultiDataSourceAction<X extends DataSource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.actions.DataSourceAction<X>
        • com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.ui.actions.MultiDataSourceAction<X>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Action

    public abstract class MultiDataSourceAction<X extends DataSource>
extends DataSourceAction<X>
    Abstract DataSourceAction which can be used as a basis for any action available (enabled) just for one or more selected DataSources in Applications window..
    Author:
    Jiri Sedlacek
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
